key_features: Vinyl Coated For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
Help tone and sculpt your arms, shoulders and back
Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
ai_description: The product consists of brightly colored, vinyl-coated dumbbells with a hexagonal shape to prevent rolling. The brand KAKSS and the weight (e.g., 3 KG) are printed in white on the ends. The coating appears durable and textured for a non-slip grip. Images show the dumbbells in use during workouts, resting on gym floors, and displayed in an infographic highlighting their color-coded weights and professional-grade cast-iron core. The overall aesthetic is vibrant and functional, aimed at a home or gym setting.
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
